title: mankk 4PCS Appliance Inline Cord Switch AC 250V 10A On Off Lamp Bulb Wall Line Button Control Switch with Red LED Indicator Light

feature_bullets: 【Package include】4PCS Inline Rocker Switch .Voltage: AC 250V; Current: 10A

【Wide Compatibility】This compact appliance switch on/off button can be used for table lamp switch, mirror lights, wall lamps, etc. light switch is ideal for replacing old switches in bedrooms, dining rooms and living rooms
【Easy To Install】 Bipolar connection, easy to install; Suitable for lighting products, can be connected with two wires or three wires; You can complete the installation in a few minutes.

【Quality Material】 The outside of this inline switch made of high quality plastic and inside of this lamp switch replacement have copper double-wire contacts. It is durable and button switch is convenient use, simple design, safe and reliable.
【Buy with confidence 】For your best choices,the most comfortable goods ever have.If you have any questions, please contact us in time and we will help you solve them

customers_say: Customers find the switch works well and is easy to install. They appreciate its sleek appearance and good quality, with one customer specifically noting the red indicator light feature.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsUser and installer friendly inline switch with LED light
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Important install tips for this item:If you like to have the LED light on, when you turn on the switch.  Connect the LED light side toward to device direction. The no LED light side connects to the plug direction.  .  If you want the LED light ALWAYS ON, then connect the LED light toward the plug direction.There is a connect hole under the connect screw head. Don’t need to wrap the wire around the connect screw.  Just insert the wire into the hole then tighten up the screw.  This is very user friendly and easy.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Works as intended but found instructions to be lacking. Suggest hot in from wall on switch side for continuous power indicator light and back retaining screws out all the way before inserting stripped wire as catch when inserting wire is frustrating. Otherwise good value for intended purpose considering alternatives.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsStupid simple to install, works perfectly
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I install lots of inline switches on my aquarium pumps and lights, and other household devices. In efforts to reduce size and cost, some that I have purchased have been very tedious to install and will not work with ordinary 16 ga. lampcord. This one is a bit beefier and installed in a jiffy on my latest aquarium pump - and it has an indicator light, as well. I bought more than I needed but will be happy to have extras on hand!

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEasy to install; love the red indicator light
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Used this switch on a hanging light bulb / china ball in a closet that has no electricity.I installed it right on the lamp cord, which already had a thumb switch, but very close to the bulb, where I couldn't reach it.*** Please note: Directions are on the product page - they don't send directions in the package. If you have never installed a switch like this before, make sure you read the directions and watch a few videos online. :)Prior to buying this switch, I was using a cube switch, which was cumbersome and often fell off. I had to keep taping it to the door jamb.*Indicator Light* this switch has an indicator light. You can install it two ways; depending on the direction you install it, the indicator light either a. stays on all the time, or b. turns on when the light is turned off.I love being able to see the switch. My closet is completely dark otherwise.Highly recommend. It's attractive and does the job.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: It was an add onto a under counter lighting system

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2024

The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    








  
  
    Used to add a physical On/Off switch to a mini iron that didn't have a switch, only a temperature control (it was on as soon as you plugged it in)

customer_reviews.review_title: 3.0 out of 5 starsObnoxiously hard to put in wiring...
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I have a belt sander that 'had' no switch on the plug wiring. Plug the sander in and it's on, and that had to change! I purchased these because of the higher amp rating than others have figuring extra means better. Time will tell on the longevity of the switch, but it's on and working... with extreme difficulty!!  And, it's not set up for a 3 wire system which is insane.I was hoping to put eyelet's on the wires, but there's not enough room for them... so I went with bare 'braided' wires and spent over an hour trying to get the wire inserted into the tiny connectors with only about 1/2" of wiring to hold on too. It's the 'push and pray' method if the wire would go in the connector or not... and most of the time it didn't.Minor "intelligent" changes would make it much-much easier to install the wiring and accommodate a 3 wire power cord. I cannot exactly 'not' recommend these switches as they may work great, but just be aware that putting the wires in them will definitely test your patience.
